name: Ice Age (itch) (Frozelar)
description:
Description:

Ice Age is a simplistic and very concise 2D platformer. It was originally being made for the Game By Its Cover 2016 game jam, though I intend on expanding it after the jam is complete. My initial plan was simply to construct a cute and tiny game to ensure that I never got overwhelmed and that I could complete it within the 30 day deadline, which I feel I managed to do quite well.

Open Source:

I programmed the game from scratch using C++ and SDL. It is open source (licensed under the LGPL), and the repository can be found here.

Contact:

If you would like to give me feedback, modify the game, or anything else, I'd love to hear from you! You can send me a tweet (@Frozelar) or send me an email (frostyfish88@gmail.com).

Thanks for checking out my game!
